review.description: Excellent pizza. Had the veggie and margarita. Loved them both. Also clean inside. Friendly service.
review.author: J P.

review.description: Went there recently to satisfy a pizza craving. The place was clean, the staff was pleasant. The pizza was ok, but, not outstanding. The pizza sauce was somewhat bland.
review.author: Jeffrey M.

review.description: Best pizza place in the area! Blows Monty Qs and Antonio's away. There are no creepy workers here; like the previous establishments that I mentioned,which is refreshing! Cheap and fresh food! The guys who work there are great! Thank God I found this place!
review.author: Julia M.

review.description: Food was good but the best part is the owner. A gregarious brooklyn native he makes eating in a great experience.
review.author: Madeline H.

review.description: The pizza is really good, the crust, the cheese, the sauce. The people are super, super nice. They made a mistake and sent a cheese pizza instead of a pepperoni one and promptly brought a new pizza, apologized and told us to keep the cheese pizza as well. They care and they know what they're doing. Good combination.
review.author: Jane R.

review.description: I have had the great fortune of being in an elevator whrn a man was signing the praises of Piz-zetta.  He loved their pizza.  He said it was really authentic.  He raved about their spinach pizza.  I love spinach and especially sauted spinach with garlic and olive oil.  I had to go there right away and try it.  It was amazing.  The spinach was just like it had been sauted and it had been.  I asked.  I was on cloud nine.  I have been back several times this week.  I have tried theri cheese pizza, blanca, broccoli, and had the spinach again.  All were fabulous!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Their prices are great too.  Try it, I think you'll love it too!  Enjoy!!!!
review.author: Toni C.

review.description: Love their Margarita slice!!! I have only ordered to go but it's seriously the best pizza in the area. Very very fresh & for sure doesn't look or taste like it's been sitting out all day like most places. No more $1 pizza for me!
review.author: Katrina T.

review.description: The best pizza in Downtown Brooklyn / Brooklyn Heights. Everything about it is near perfect.
review.author: Richard T.

review.description: I live around the corner, and I come here way too much. It's a consistently good slice of pizza made and served by good people.
review.author: Sara B.
